original: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno naakusalo
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
